attributes.action: Knight the 5 un-knighted footballers from the 1966 World Cup Winning team.
attributes.additional_details: Of the original team, Bobby Moore, Gordon Banks and  Ray Wilson have died. Bobby Charlton was knighted in 1994 and Geoff Hurst in 1998. This leaves Jackie Charlton, George Cohen, Nobby Stiles, Martin Peters and Roger Hunt.
attributes.background: In this day of Instant recognition and mediocre celebrity it is inconceivable that all the players of the1966 World Cup winners have not been Knighted.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
